text: enterprise accounts can have 10 child themes, pro accounts 5, and starter/free 1 - if you're limited to 1 child theme, you either have maxed out already or you're not on an enterprise account.
Thanks for the reply, after I made this post I realized that particular issue was for another portal with a starter subscription...so all good on this front. Thanks again.
You're welcome, glad you got it sorted!
